name: Departure flights leave in July and December for the next two years
scenarioId: classpath:features/mars/search_flights_to_mars:Departure flights leave in July and December for the next two years
methodName: Departure flights leave in July and December for the next two years

testSteps.description: Given Martin is on the MarsAir homepage
When he wants to look for available flights

Then he should see the following departure months:
| July |
| December |
| July (next year) |
| December (next year) |
| July (two years from now) |
| December (two years from now) |

And he should see the following return months:
| July |
| December |
| July (next year) |
| December (next year) |
| July (two years from now) |
| December (two years from now) |
1: Martin wants to book a flight to Mars ({Departure=July, Return=December (two years from now), Expected Result=Call now on 0800 MARSAIR to book!})

children.description: Given Martin is on the MarsAir homepage

When he looks for available flights for the following dates:
| Departure | Return |
| July | December (two years from now) |
Then he should be told "Call now on 0800 MARSAIR to book!"

testSteps.description: 2: Martin wants to book a flight to Mars ({Departure=July, Return=July (next year), Expected Result=Sorry, there are no more seats available.})

children.description: Given Martin is on the MarsAir homepage

When he looks for available flights for the following dates:
| Departure | Return |
| July | July (next year) |
Then he should be told "Sorry, there are no more seats available."

testSteps.description: 3: Martin wants to book a flight to Mars ({Departure=December, Return=December (next year), Expected Result=Sorry, there are no more seats available.})

children.description: Given Martin is on the MarsAir homepage

When he looks for available flights for the following dates:
| Departure | Return |
| December | December (next year) |
Then he should be told "Sorry, there are no more seats available."

testSteps.description: 4: Martin wants to book a flight to Mars ({Departure=July, Return=December, Expected Result=Unfortunately, this schedule is not possible. Please try again.})

children.description: Given Martin is on the MarsAir homepage

When he looks for available flights for the following dates:
| Departure | Return |
| July | December |
Then he should be told "Unfortunately, this schedule is not possible. Please try again."

userStory.narrative:
As a MarsAir Sales Director (Mark)
  I want potential customers to be able to search for flights to Mars
  So that they see what trips are available

  Acceptance criteria

  - There should be ‘departure’ and ‘return’ fields on a search form.
  - Flights leave every six months, in July and December, both ways.
  - Trips for the next two years should be searchable.
  - If there are seats, display “Seats available! Call 0800 MARSAIR to book!”
  - If there are no seats, display “Sorry, there are no more seats available.”

  Martin is a potential customer who wants to book a flight to Mars.

title: Departure flights leave in July and December for the next two years

rule.name: If there are seats, display “Seats available! Call 0800 MARSAIR to book!” otherwise display “Sorry, there are no more seats available.”
